abstract: Letter from Shahar Azani, spokesman for the Consulate General of Israel, comments on Oct 19 editorial on the release of Israeli soldier Gilad Shalit.
snippet: An Israeli official responds to a recent editorial about the release of Gilad Shalit in exchange for the release of hundreds of prisoners.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli official responds to a recent editorial about the release of Gilad Shalit in exchange for the release of hundreds of prisoners.

headline.main: Gilad Shalit’s Return: The Israeli Government’s View
headline.print_headline: Gilad Shalit’s Return: The Israeli Government’s View
